title: Python Programming Masterclass
details: Learn Python from scratch and become a Python expert. Covers basic to advanced concepts.

title: JavaScript for Beginners
details: Start your journey into web development with JavaScript. Learn fundamental concepts and build projects.

title: Java Programming: From Zero to Hero
details: Comprehensive course covering Java programming language, including OOP concepts and data structures.

title: C++ Crash Course
details: Quick dive into C++ programming. Suitable for beginners and those familiar with other languages.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
details: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build responsive websites. Includes projects and practical exercises.

title: Data Science Fundamentals
details: Introduction to data science, covering Python libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
details: Build cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter and Dart programming language.

title: Machine Learning Basics
details: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and techniques using Python and scikit-learn.

title: Introduction to Blockchain Development
details: Learn about blockchain technology and develop basic blockchain applications.
